item.title: Publications
item.description: 2019 Modelling Scene data for Render time Estimation Conference : Siggraph Asia 2019, Brisbane, Australia Category : Poster Description : A technique to estimate Render time of an Image of a typical 3D scene, based off previous renders. Links : Posters Gallery Publication 2012 Network Intrusion Detection Conference : International Conference on Emerging Trends in Electrical, Communication and Information Technologies 2012, India Category : Technical Paper Description : A novel approach to detect and classify network intrusions from malicious access.

item.title: Accelerate: The best (TECH) book I've read this year
item.description: The book I wish to introduce to you today is titled Accelerate ‚è©, from authors Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble & Gene Kim. This post isn’t a review ‚Äî it is a short summary of my opinions and insights gained upon reading this book. I’d highly recommend it for anyone who is writing any kind of software(I absolutely mean it üòÑ). How often do we get started with writing code caring very little about deployment in the beginning ‚Äî to realise that we should have thought about it from the start(even if that’s for rapid prototyping).

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there üëã, thanks for stopping by! I’m Harsha. Software Engineer by profession ‚Äî interested in all things Data Science, Distributed Systems and Computer Graphics. Apart from that, I enjoy travelling üöÖ, cycling üö¥‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è and reading üìö. For most of my career, I’ve worked in the Visual FX and Post production industry üçø. Super proud to be working in the studio that made the Gravitational renderer for the movie Interstellar.
